texts: If the Vehicle Registration Mark is correct but the vehicle description shown is wrong, you can still transfer the charge.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA or DVA, so you'll need to let the DVLA or DVA know if your vehicle details are wrong or need to be updated.
Before paying the Congestion Charge, you may want to view our privacy notice .
You cannot transfer the charge to this vehicle - it has already been paid for some or all of the dates you have selected. Please choose another vehicle or consider applying for a refund .

Based on the vehicle registration (VRM) details that you have entered and the classification information held by Transport for London (TfL) on this day, your vehicle is deemed 100% discounted and you are not required to pay the congestion charge.
If you believe that this information is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, then you can continue.
Please be aware that classification may change without notification, so you should always check to see if payment is required for journeys into the zone.
Based on the vehicle registration details you have entered and the classification information held by the DVLA or DVA and TfL on this day, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge.
If you believe this information is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue with this process.
This information is correct as of today’s date, but may change without notice. Always check to see if payment is required for travel within the zone.
If the Vehicle Registration Mark is correct but the vehicle description shown is wrong, you can still continue to pay for this vehicle.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA or DVA, so you'll need to let the DVLA or DVA know if your vehicle details are wrong or need to be updated.
We do not hold any details for your vehicle.
UK-registered: If your vehicle’s make and model details have not been returned, please make sure you entered the Vehicle Registration Mark correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the UK: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm your details before continuing.
Before paying the Congestion Charge, you may want to view our privacy notice .
You cannot transfer the charge to this vehicle - it has already been paid for some or all of the dates you have selected. Please choose another vehicle or consider applying for a refund .

The vehicle you have selected is charged at a different value to the original vehicle. Charges can only be amended to vehicles that attract the same Congestion Charge value. If you still intend to drive the new vehicle in the zone you will need to pay an additional charge
